title: 安装打字Mod后出现以下情况
author: richtofen
txt_content:
求解啊{:10_503:}


      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception occured in ModLoader

A full error report has been saved to F:\游戏运行夹\Java\MC\MineCraft 1.4.2 简单整合\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-04-13_23.55.22-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
